title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
Hello,

I have an A1466 820-00165-A with no backlight, that has no liquid contact. It just stoped working. i´ve tried with a working LCD and it has no BL.
The FL7700 is ok and has 8.5V, R77989 has 8.5V, Q7707 has 8.2V on LCDBKLT_EN_L, and 3.3V on BKLT_PLT_RST_L,  but on Q7707 i have 0V on EDP_BKLT_EN.

Can you help me?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: Do you get image and USB activity?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: Yes. I do get image and USB activity.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
EDP_BKLT_EN must be high, to get backlight.
Try PRAM reset 2-3 times.
If still the same, force pin 3/Q7707 to ground and test again.

Check diode mode to ground on both pins of D7701.
Be sure XW7720 is good.
Post BKL_EN/PWM levels.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
D7701
Pin1 = 0.420V
Pin2 =0.628V

XW7720 is OK

BKL_PWM = 0V
BKL_EN  = 0V

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
"BKL_PWM = 0V
BKL_EN  = 0V"
Then you cannot expect backlight...

Try full compatible LCD assembly.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
Sorry, i was measuring them without lcd connected.
Here are the correct readings:

BKL_PWM = 1.46V
BKL_EN  = 2.84V"

EDP_BKLT_EN 3.3V on Q7707 but no BL

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
"BKL_PWM = 1.46V"
Did you try PRAM reset 2-3 times?

If still the same, remove R7704 and run a wire from C7704 to R7715.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
I´ve done the PRAM 5 times and made the jumper but with no success. No BL.

BKL_PWM  with jumper = 2.84V

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: Any corrosion sign at A5 ball of U7701?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: No corrosion at all.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
D7701 voltages?
LCD connected, of course...

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: 8.55V on both pins

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
"Try full compatible LCD assembly"
???

Keep BKL_EN/PWM joined for testing puropse.

Check all return resistors and compare diode mode to ground.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
Yes, I´ve tried with a working LCD and no BL.

Can you please specify the return resistors?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: All return resistors are good (0.25 ohm), and diode readings are good (0.625mV)

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: I just realize that all the resistors are bad... they show arround 0.25 ohm, but they should be 10.2 ohm, isn't it?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: 0 ohm value is correct.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: Do you have any ideas? Should I replace the U7701?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
You should replace U7701 and be sure to get good solders.
Once removed, check continuity from A5 ball to D7701.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: It worked! Thank you very much.
